Neko-Love

Neko-Love is a collection of high-quality images featuring characters with anime-style appearances.

Get Started

Anime-Themed Image API

Neko-Love is a public API that serves random anime-style images and GIFs, mainly themed around "neko" (cat-girl) and other anime reactions. Itâ€™s widely used for fun interactions in chatbots and web apps.

Multiple Endpoints

The API provides various endpoints like neko, azurlane, kitsune, maid, and more.

Cost-Free and Accessible API

The API is provided at no cost and requires an authentication token, which can be easily generated by creating a Neko-Love account for free.
